question: ‘Delivering Road Safety in India’ is a report released by which organisation/ ministry?
option4: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
explanation:
World Bank has released a report titled “Delivering Road Safety in India” during the ongoing ‘Third Global Ministerial Conference on Road Safety’ in the capital of Sweden, Stockholm.
As per the report, India has to invest an estimated amount of additional $109 billion in road safety in the next decade.  With the investment, economic benefits equivalent to 3.7 per cent of the GDP can be witnessed annually.
